edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.model.scrum_backlog

Class TaskItemList

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.model.scrum_backlog.TaskItemList

  • public class TaskItemList
extends java.lang.Object
    Concrete class that maintains a current list of TaskItems in the Scrum Backlog system. Has methods to add TaskItems, empty the list, add XML tasks, get TaskItems (filtering by owner, creator, and id as well), execute a Command, and delete tasks.
    Author:
    Selena Chen

      Constructs a TaskItemList object.

      void addXMLTasks(java.util.List<edu.ncsu.csc216.task.xml.Task> tasks)
      Adds a List of Tasks from the XML library to the list of TaskItems.

      Deletes a TaskItem with the given id from the list of TaskItems.
